title: Schizandrin A promotes apoptosis in prostate cancer by inducing ROS-mediated endoplasmic reticulum stress and JNK MAPK signaling activation.
abstract: Prostate cancer (PCa) is the most common malignant tumor in males with limited therapies. Schizandrin A (SchA) is a biologically active lignan isolated from the fruit of Schisandra chinensis. This research aimed to evaluate the roles and mechanisms of SchA in the progression of PCa.
